title: House that Jack built
brief_description: An information film on the operation of the Local Building Trade Apprenticeship Scheme in England. Shows high school students working as laborers at a housing project construction site as part of a work experience scheme.
description: An information film on the operation of the Local Building Trade Apprenticeship Scheme in England. Shows high school students working as laborers at a housing project construction site as part of a work experience scheme.
